snippet: The United States national team played an exhibition game against Scotland that seemed meaningless to just about everyone but a few American players.
lead_paragraph: The United States national team played an exhibition game against Scotland that seemed meaningless to just about everyone but a few American players.

headline.main: For U.S., Scotland Game Was Chance to Evaluate Young Talent
headline.print_headline: For U.S., Scotland Game Was Chance to Evaluate Young Talent
